resources.string: Welcome to this simple but not easy Quizzy Cheesy with astronomical Theme. Start by tapping on one of the empty Buttons!
Thank you for doing all the Questions. Below you can find your points and how you perform on this little Quizzy Cheesy.

Thank you for Playing!
All Images are from Pixabay.
Great Community!
All Questions are Effective by 04.2017

Thanks to all Helpers, 
Mods, Mates and 
everyone giving Feedback.
Please, write out ISS in full. (don\'t forget to scroll down)
What is the main color of Mars? (all lower case)
No answer chosen. Please try again!
Only one answer chosen. Please chose another!
You did not fill all fields.

string-array.name: question
string-array.item: What are the four categories, Astronomical observatories are usually divided upon? Space based, airborne, ground based and . . .

About 71 percent of the Earth\'s surface is water-covered, and the oceans hold about 96.5 percent of all Earth\'s water, but take all this water (from earth and air and everywhere) and put it into a bubble. How much diameter would this Bubble have?
Concerning Sport and Space, which court or field comes closest to the dimensions of the ISS?
Everyone knows those astonishing color spectacles on the Northern Hemisphere, but what about the Southern Hemisphere. What country might give a sight on those rare phenomenon\’s?
How many spacecraft’s have been launched to explore the moon?
And, how many missions to the moon have been considered successful (including unmanned, orbital and impact mission)?
The temperature on the surface of the sun is around 5778 kelvins. What do you guess? How hot is the corona of the sun (the plasma layers above the surface)?
What is the moment in the above image usually called?
How many Planets inhabit our solar system?
What Pet gave this nebula its name?
How many Laws of Robotics have been written by Isaac Asimov (including later Modification)?

This is more a guess-question: Concerning the vast number of stars existing in outer space. How many star systems with intelligent life could exist, when only one in a billion stars bear intelligent life?
Which Planet is closest to the Sun?
How many moons orbit around Saturn?
Which Planets are closest to Earth?
USA and Russia sent the most Astronauts to the ISS, but which two countries come after them?
